title: The Canary in the Coalmine: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 21, 2025

title: Philippines Bets on Sui's Move Language as Education System Struggles With Basics
contentSnippet: A crypto industry-backed developer program is giving students in a remote province their first exposure to on-chain building.

title: Winklevoss twins bet on Zcash, privacy to combat AI threat
contentSnippet: Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss are betting on privacy protocols gaining major traction as AI continues to grow at an exponential rate.

title: aPriori denies insider role as mysterious entity claims most of APR airdrop
contentSnippet: While aPriori dismissed the claims related to insider activity, investors are still awaiting more details on the Sybil cluster that claimed 60% of the airdrop across 14,000 wallets.

title: Indonesia Detains Hacker Tied to Markets.com Crypto Theft After $398K Loss
contentSnippet: Authorities say the suspect exploited weak backend validation to manipulate USDT balances on the trading platform.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: Snipers Made $1.3M on Jesse Pollak’s Creator-Coin Debut on Base
contentSnippet: Two traders captured more than $1.3 million in profits by exploiting Base’s new “flashblocks” system during the debut of the network founder’s creator coin.

title: Binance CEO says Bitcoin volatility matches broader markets amid 35% decline
contentSnippet: Binance CEO Richard Teng argued that Bitcoin’s current slide reflects broader risk-off deleveraging, and its volatility is in line with most major asset classes.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin, Ether Slide as Liquidity Crisis Fuels Heavy Sell-Off
contentSnippet: Crypto markets plunged toward April lows on Friday as a lingering liquidity crunch amplified price swings. Bitcoin and ether fell more than 10%.

title: Ark Invest Adds Nearly $40M of Crypto Equities for Second Day as Sell-Off Continues
contentSnippet: The St. Petersburg, Florida-based investment manager added to its holdings in Coinbase, Bitmine Immersion Technologies, Circle Internet and Bullish.

title: Nearly $1B Liquidated In an Hour as Bitcoin Plunges Below $82K
contentSnippet: A leverage-driven crash liquidated nearly $1B in an hour as Bitcoin continued its slide, pushing the total crypto market cap under $3T.

title: Exactly One Year After Strategy’s All Time High, the Bitcoin-Linked Slide Intensifies
contentSnippet: Strategy's stock price has fallen sharply alongside bitcoin, marking one of its worst drawdowns since it adopted a bitcoin treasury strategy in 2020.

title: Bitcoin Suffers Flash Crash to $80K on Hyperliquid Amid Market Volatility
contentSnippet: BTC dropped by $3K within a minute on Hyperliquid.

title: DOGE Chart Turns Fully Bearish After Multi-Level Support Failure
contentSnippet: Technical indicators show Dogecoin is deeply oversold, trading below its 50-day and 200-day moving averages, signaling continued trend weakness.

title: SoftBank’s PayPay changes the game for Binance Japan users
contentSnippet: Operated by SoftBank, the backer of one of the world’s top 10 public Bitcoin holders, PayPay is integrating with Binance Japan ahead of its expected US IPO in December.

title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF sheds $2.47B in November as outflows hit record $3.79B
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s IBIT drives November’s record ETF outflows, bleeding $2.47 billion and accounting for 63% of the $3.79 billion withdrawn from US spot Bitcoin ETFs.

title: Crypto Bulls See $1.7B Liquidations as Bitcoin Swiftly Nears $80K
contentSnippet: The Crypto Fear & Greed Index fell to 11 on Monday — deep within “extreme fear” territory and its lowest reading since late 2022.

title: 米ビットコインETF、1週間で大規模な資金流出が2回　史上2・3番目の規模
contentSnippet: 11月20日、米ビットコイン現物ETFは9億300万ドル（約1,395億円）の純流出を記録し、史上2番目の規模となった。1週間前の記録を更新。ブラックロック、グレースケール、フィデリティの主要3ファンドで流出の大部分を占め、全ETFで純流入ゼロという異例の事態に。

title: Bitcoin ETFs Have Bled a Record $3.79B in November
contentSnippet: U.S.-listed spot BTC and ETH ETFs see record outflows.

title: 予測市場が急成長　カルシ（Kalshi）が1500億円調達と報道も
contentSnippet: 予測市場カルシが2ヶ月で評価額2倍超の110億ドルで10億ドル調達。取引量は10月に過去最高の44億ドルを記録。競合ポリマーケットも120億〜150億ドルでの追加調達を協議中で、予測市場への投資が加速。

title: 暗号資産(仮想通貨)の申告分離課税が実現したら?押さえておきたい税務のポイント｜Aerial Partners寄稿
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨の申告分離課税が現実味を帯びてきた今、投資家が知っておくべき税制変更のポイントを解説。税率の一定化、損益通算、特定口座の導入可能性など、制度導入後の注意点と準備すべきことをわかりやすく紹介します。

title: CAICAテクノロジーズ、JPYC決済ソリューションの提供を開始
contentSnippet: CAICAテクノロジーズが日本円ステーブルコインJPYCの決済ソリューション提供を開始。企業向けにコンサルティングサービスと決済モジュールを提供し、ステーブルコイン決済の導入を支援する。

title: ナッジ、ステーブルコイン決済・還元対応クレカ「HashPortカード」発行開始
contentSnippet: HashPortとナッジが日本初となる後払い型クリプトクレジットカード「HashPortカード」を発行開始。ステーブルコインJPYCで決済・還元が可能で、利用額の0.3%をJPYCで還元。年会費無料、カード発行手数料2,500円。

title: Yen Slump Is Bullish for BTC and Risk Assets. Or Is It?
contentSnippet: Historically, yen weakness has been linked to risk-on sentiment. However, this narrative now appears challenged against the backdrop of Japan’s mounting fiscal strains.

title: 金融庁が語る暗号資産規制改革の全貌──銀行参入、インサイダー規制、DEX対応の狙い｜独占取材
contentSnippet: 金融庁独占取材。暗号資産規制の金商法移行について、銀行グループ子会社の参入、インサイダー取引規制導入、分散型取引所(DEX)対応の狙いを詳しく聞く。投資家保護と健全なイノベーション両立への取り組みを解説。

title: Plume CEO tips RWA to grow 3-5x in 2026 as it grows past crypto natives
contentSnippet: Plume says that Securitize, a tokenization platform backed by BlackRock and Morgan Stanley, has inked a deal to deploy institutional-grade assets on Plume’s Nest staking protocol.

title: Crypto Firms Push Trump to Direct Agencies on Stalled Regulatory Guidance
contentSnippet: Industry groups have urged Trump to use executive authority to speed crypto rules, saying agencies can offer clarity without Congress.

title: MSCI index likely to kick out crypto treasuries, exec warns
contentSnippet: If the MSCI decides to exclude digital asset treasuries, index-tracking funds would need to sell, and that alone “creates meaningful pressure on the affected names.”

title: Bitcoiners lose their mind after Scott Bessent walks into a Bitcoin bar
contentSnippet: Bitcoiners viewed US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s appearance at the opening night of the Bitcoin-themed bar as “a sign” for Bitcoin.

title: Grok fan-girling Elon Musk shows why AI must be decentralized
contentSnippet: Grok couldn’t stop singing Elon Musk’s praises, arguing he could beat Mike Tyson in a fight and was fitter than NBA superstar LeBron James.

title: Bitcoin Core、史上初の公開セキュリティ監査をクリア　「重大な脆弱性なし」
contentSnippet: ビットコインの基盤ソフトウェアBitcoin Coreが16年の歴史で初となる第三者セキュリティ監査を完了した。Quarkslabによる4ヶ月間の徹底調査で致命的な脆弱性は発見されず、300兆円規模のネットワークの安全性が裏付けられた。

title: Crypto Sentiment Hits 'Extreme Fear' Amid $2.7 Trillion S&P 500 Wipeout
contentSnippet: Widening U.S. credit spreads, overextended market gains, and an uncertain macro landscape are being blamed for Thursday's wipeout.

title: 金融安定理事会、ステーブルコイン監視強化を表明　G20サミット前に警告
contentSnippet: 金融安定理事会（FSB）のベイリー議長がG20首脳会議を前にステーブルコイン規制強化を表明。市場規模3000億ドル突破を受け、ECBも警戒。2026年作業計画で国際協力推進。

title: 仮想通貨団体ら、税制改正などをトランプ大統領に要望
contentSnippet: ソラナ政策研究所など65以上の仮想通貨団体がトランプ大統領に書簡を提出。税制の改善、規制の明確化、イノベーションや開発者保護の取り組みを求めた。

title: Secured Finance CEOが語るJPYC固定金利レンディングの挑戦｜独占インタビュー
contentSnippet: Secured Finance菊池氏が語るJPYC固定金利レンディングの全貌。日本円を世界の金利ベンチマークにする構想、RWA担保展開、x402対応など最新戦略を独占取材。

title: UK Fraud Office Probes $28M Crypto Fund Collapse, Two Arrested
contentSnippet: The office has begun probing Basis Markets, a defunct crypto project accused of misappropriating investor funds.

title: Google Sparks Backlash After Gmail Setting Lets Gemini Peek Inside Inboxes
contentSnippet: Google has faced criticism after a buried setting allowed Gemini to scan inboxes and calendars without clear notice to users.

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy Could Shed Billions If Removed From Stock Indices: JPMorgan
contentSnippet: Analysts from the investment banking giant wrote in a note Thursday that removal from MSCI indices could lead to $2.8 billion in outflows.

title: America's Open Source AI Gambit: Two Labs, One Question—Can the US Compete?
contentSnippet: Deep Cogito's model builds on Chinese foundations while Allen Institute starts from scratch. Both aim to counter China's dominance in open AI.

title: Myriad Moves: Markets Grow Bearish on Bitcoin and Ethereum as Rate Cut Odds Tumble
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on where Bitcoin and Ethereum are headed next, plus if the Fed will cut rates again this year.
